cooldown.error:
Sorry, the {{commandName}} command previously errored out. Please try again {{discordRelativeStamp}}.
If this keeps happening, please contact support [here]({{supportServer}}).
cooldown.normal: You will be able to use the {{commandName}} command {{discordRelativeStamp}}.

command.devOnlyWarning: You are not allowed to use the {{commandName}} command. This incident was logged.
command.error: There was an error while running this command!

option1.name: command
